message.content: {"given_definition_quality":52,"better_definition":"to see or meet someone","sentence":"我见她。","image_prompt":"A young person meets a female friend outdoors. Both smile warmly as they see each other, with soft apocalypse animation style: gentle pastel hues, surreal dreamy atmosphere, hints of overgrown ruins in the background, sunlight filtering through clouds, creating an inviting scene of reunion.","sentence_translation":"I see her."}
